sys_script.name: Set Name

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_7515d66f9765c21069a3b6fce053afa5
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>x_62500_mealplan_meal_plan</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="x_62500_mealplan_meal_plan">start_dateVALCHANGES^ORend_dateVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="start_date" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/> <item endquery="false" field="end_date" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/> <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Set Name</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
current.name = gs.getMessage("{0} - {1} {2}", [getDayOfMonth(current.start_date), getDayOfMonth(current.end_date), getMonth(current.start_date)]);
function getDayOfMonth(date) { var gd = new GlideDate(); gd.setValue(date); return gd.getDayOfMonthNoTZ(); }
function getMonth(date) { var months = ["January", "February", "March", "April", "May", "June", "July", "August", "September", "October", "November", "December"]; var gd = new GlideDate(); gd.setValue(date); return months[gd.getMonthNoTZ()-1]; }
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-20 01:55:34</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>7515d66f9765c21069a3b6fce053afa5</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Set Name</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Meal Planner" source="x_62500_mealplan">b64f09f19734021069a3b6fce053af1a</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Meal Planner">b64f09f19734021069a3b6fce053af1a</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_7515d66f9765c21069a3b6fce053afa5</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-04-20 02:23:47</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=7515d66f9765c21069a3b6fce053afa5"/> </record_update>
